2  PracTwo

2.1 Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

2.2 Question 1

library(foreach)

result <- foreach(i = 1:100, .combine = rbind) %do% {
    s <- rexp(100, 1)
    m <- mean(s)
    v <- var(s)
    c(meam = m,variance = v)
}
result

2.3 Question 2

library(boot)
library(doParallel)
Loading required package: iterators
Loading required package: parallel
library(MASS)
library(parallel)
d2 <- galaxies


## normal
tboot1 <- numeric(1000)

system.time({
  for (i in 1:1000){
  tboot1[i] <- median(sample(d2, replace = TRUE))
  }
})
   user  system elapsed 
   0.03    0.00    0.04 
## foreach doParellel
c1 <- makeCluster(3)
clusterExport(c1, "d2")
registerDoParallel(c1)

system.time({
tboot2 <- foreach(i = 1:1000, .combine = c) %dopar% {
  median(sample(d2, replace = TRUE))
}
})
   user  system elapsed 
   0.25    0.03    0.30 
## large sample

system.time({
tboot3 <- foreach(i = 1:10000, .combine = c) %dopar% {
  median(sample(d2, replace = TRUE))
}
})
   user  system elapsed 
   2.03    0.58    2.65 
stopCluster(c1)

2.4 Question 3

coverage_count <- 0
mb3 <- numeric(1000)
for (i in 1:1000) {

    s <- rexp(50, 1)
    for (i in 1:1000){
    b3 <- sample(s, replace = TRUE)
    mb3[i] <- mean(b3)
    }
    ci <- quantile(mb3, c(0.025, 0.975))

    if (ci[1] <= 1 && 1 <= ci[2]) {
      coverage_count <- coverage_count + 1
    }
  }

  coverage_probability <- coverage_count / 1000

coverage_probability
[1] 0.925

2.5 Question 4

it <- irnorm(5)

set.seed(1234)
largest <- foreach(i = 1:3, .combine = cbind) %do% {
  v = nextElem(it)
  max(v)
}

largest
     result.1  result.2  result.3
[1,] 1.084441 0.5060559 0.9594941

2.6 Question 5

it <- irnorm(5)

c5 <- makeCluster(3)
clusterExport(c5, "max")
set.seed(1234)
vl <- list(nextElem(it), nextElem(it), nextElem(it))
system.time({
parLapply(c5,vl, max)
})
   user  system elapsed 
      0       0       0 
set.seed(1234)
system.time({
largest <- foreach(i = 1:3, .combine = cbind) %do% {
  v = nextElem(it)
  max(v)
}
})
   user  system elapsed 
      0       0       0 
set.seed(1234)
system.time({
replicate(3, max(v = nextElem(it)))
})
   user  system elapsed 
      0       0       0 
stopCluster(c5)
